room_title: Escape room "1920’s Speakeasy Murder Mystery" by Escape USA in Atlanta
review: My daughter Shae and I just attempted the 1920s Murder Mystery and although we didn’t solve the case, we had an absolute blast! What great way to spend quality time with your teenager! The staff was very warm and welcoming. We will definitely be back next month for her birthday.

room_title: Escape room "1920’s Speakeasy Murder Mystery" by Escape USA in Atlanta
review: This was our third time doing an escape game but first time at Escape USA. We did the 1920's room. So much fun! The person at the desk when we came in was great and very helpful! We will for sure be back and hopefully will escape next time! Highly recommend!

room_title: Escape room "1920’s Speakeasy Murder Mystery" by Escape USA in Atlanta
review: This was our first escape room and we did the Speakeasy. We failed to solve the murder but had a blast trying. We were skeptical but now we are sold and will be back!
